activities: ItsOn Inc. ("ItsOn") is a business-to-business services provider that provides mobile device software and a managed service platform for wireless service providers.  The ItsOn services platform augments the wireless provider’s existing network infrastructure, resulting in the capability for the provider to create, offer and  manage flexible mobile data services.  By virtue of providing the services platform and supporting the wireless service provider, ItsOn has access to the personal information of the wireless service provider’s customers that use the ItsOn service.
eucountries: Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
